## IGlBuffer interface

Dirty checked wrapper of `WebGLBuffer`<!-- -->. Modify via [IGlAttribute](./core.iglattribute.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IGlBuffer<TArray extends TTypedArray> 
```
